item.title: CVE-2023-21520|2024-09-25T19:59:01.852Z -- blackberry -- athoc
item.description: A PII Enumeration via Credential Recovery in the Self ServiceÂ (Credential Recovery) of BlackBerry AtHoc version 7.15 could allow an attacker to potentially associate a list of contact details with an AtHoc IWS organization.
